Row.Text: Long ago, the Crystal Empire was ruled by an evil unicorn named, King Sombra. He enslaved his subjects, forcing them to mine for his beloved crystals. He was defeated though by two sisters, Celestia and Luna. He was exiled by the two sisters, but before he left he cursed his empire to vanish into thin air.[NEWLINE]Now, a thousand years later, the Crystal Empire has returned. Princess Celestia has tasked Candance and Shining Armor to protect the empire from all threats. Now the Crystal Princess and her husband stand against all who would harm the empire, including the newly returned King Sombra.

Dear Princess Cadance,[NEWLINE] I have urgent news. The Crystal Empire has returned. I know you and Shining Armor have not had much time together since Queen Chrysalis attacked Canterlot, but I must ask you to journey to the Crystal Empire.[NEWLINE] Its safety is paramount to the safety of all Equestria. You and Shining Armor must protect it at all costs. With the return of King Sombra I dare not say what would happen if he would regained control of the Crystal Empire.[NEWLINE] Time is short, Princess Cadance. I am sorry to ask you, but the Crystal Empire and all of Equestria needs your help. Go, it is your birthright. Lead the Crystal Ponies, keep them safe. Ensure that the Crystal Empire does not fall.[NEWLINE]I and Luna have complete faith that you will succeed, Crystal Princess Cadance.
